archimate:Principle.name: Tietoevry Connect Security Principles
archimate:Principle.documentation:
These principles are the current C&I Security principles agreed with our CISO & CIEA team. The master document can be found here:
C&I Security Principles 1.0A.docx <https://tietocorporation.sharepoint.com/:w:/s/HISArchitecture-EAOnly2/EbR5NPsX-mFJiG58Tgu9gWQBVzKRjdtLpgx-7YgFy3OxDA?e=m3UaF7>
